inclusion.criterion: study by a research sonographer at the time of the ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: references: Burford et al. 2011, Estey et al. 2013, Fox et al. 2008, Karakas et al. 2000, Pacharn et al. 2010, Puylaert 1986
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: RLQ pain with clinical suspicion for acute appendicitis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: imaging prior to ED ultrasound performed to evaluate the RLQ
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain. She had poor appetite as well as malaise.
